quote: Do your parents know you’re here?' asked the lady at social Services. ‘No,’ I said, ‘but I want to know about children’s homes.’ I had to stand on my toes to see over the reception desk.
quote_letters: DO YOUR PARENTS KNOW YOURE HERE ASKED THE LADY AT SOCIAL SERVICES NO I SAID BUT I WANT TO KNOW ABOUT CHILDRENS HOMES I HAD TO STAND ON MY TOES TO SEE OVER THE RECEPTION DESK
